meaningMnemonic: If you look at <radical>flowers</radical> the first thing you notice are the leaves and petals themselves, then the <radical>next</radical> thing you notice are the <kanji>briar</kanji>s. You never see <kanji>thorn</kanji>s first, only after you've looked at the flowers.
readingMnemonic: When you see the <kanji>briar</kanji>s you can't help but yell, <reading>Eee! Ba riars</reading>! (いばら)! You pause funny because you prick your finger on one while you're yelling. Ouch!
